pages.text: The people around you have already helped you in one or the other dicey situation. It's time to give something back. A pinch of $(l:resources/shimmerstone)Shimmerstone$(/l) allows the package to explode in a colorful shower of particles.$(br)Click the Present onto the items you want to gift, wrap it in a $(item)Crafting Table$(), then all you have to do is place it down for the recipient to open it and watch them jump in joy.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)(Or, you know, you can always gift your future self!)

pages.title: Customizing &
pages.text: $(li)Place a filled Present in a crafting grid to wrap it.$(li)Optional: add $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() for a colorful particle shower$(li)Optional: add a special item to choose a wrapping paper:$(li2)Red Dye: Red$(li2)Blue Dye: Blue
